title: Issue with 'char_to_token()' function of DistilBertTokenizerFast
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['src/transformers/tokenization_utils_base.py', 'src/transformers/models/distilbert/tokenization_distilbert_fast.py', 'tests/test_tokenization_common.py', 'tests/test_tokenization_distilbert.py', 'src/transformers/models/auto/tokenization_auto.py'], 'reasoning': '1. src/transformers/tokenization_utils_base.py: Contains the implementation of char_to_token(), so is the most critical for fixing character-to-token mapping bugs.
2. src/transformers/models/distilbert/tokenization_distilbert_fast.py: Implements DistilBertTokenizerFast, which may need model-specific corrections if the mapping logic is delegated or incorrectly inherited.
3. tests/test_tokenization_common.py: Contains general tests of the char_to_token function and must be updated/expanded to validate bug fixes for all models.
4. tests/test_tokenization_distilbert.py: Provides model-specific tests for DistilBertTokenizerFast; should be adjusted to check correct char-to-token behavior after fixes.
5. src/transformers/models/auto/tokenization_auto.py: Handles auto-selection and registration of tokenizer classes, which may require updates if the fix affects how models locate DistilBertTokenizerFast.'}
